channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Space stocks set to climb, boosted by Virgin Galactic and Rocket Lab results
item.description: Rocket Lab reported a 71% revenue jump when it reported second-quarter results Thursday.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield dips as traders weigh state of U.S. economy after latest data
item.description: U.S. Treasury yields were slightly lower early Friday as investors continue to assess weekly jobless claims data.

item.title: Stock futures are little changed after S&P 500 scores best day since 2022: Live updates
item.description: Stock futures were flat Friday after investors looked to regain more ground from this week's sell-off.

item.title: 20 stocks the bears can‚Äôt easily short ‚Äî and that‚Äôs why you shouldn‚Äôt buy them
item.description: Companies that short-sellers struggle to bet against ‚Äî like Super Micro Computer ‚Äî are likely overvalued.

item.title: Trump appears to confuse former Mayor Willie Brown with former Gov. Jerry Brown
item.description: Trump also claimed that Willie Brown told him "terrible things about" Harris and that Brown was "not a fan of hers very much at that point."

item.title: SoftBank-backed Indian EV startup Ola Electric pops 20% on debut valuing firm at $4.8 billion
item.description: Shares of Ola Electric surged 20% on their market debut as investors bet the company is set to become a key player in India's EV industry.

item.title: Perrigo voluntarily recalls 16,500 cans of baby formula because of excessive levels of vitamin D
item.description: For most infants, short-term consumption of the affected formula is unlikely to cause harm. But in a small subset of infants, such as those with impaired renal function, there is ‚Äúthe potential that consumption of the recalled product could result in health complications,‚Äù a statement said.

item.title: Advertising group suspends brand safety unit after Elon Musk's antitrust lawsuit
item.description: The World Federation of Advertisers said it's suspending operations of its Global Alliance for Responsible Media after Elon Musk's X filed an antitrust lawsuit.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield dips as traders weigh state of U.S. economy after latest data
item.description: U.S. Treasury yields were slightly lower early Friday as investors continue to assess weekly jobless claims data.

item.title: This strategist downgraded tech just before the summer swoon. Now he says buy and here‚Äôs why.
item.description: This analyst downgraded tech before the slide and now he says buy

item.title: Trump and Harris agree to Sept. 10 debate on ABC, two more dates in the works
item.description: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump held a news conference at Mar-a-Lago as he tries to slow the momentum of Democratic rival Kamala Harris.

item.title: Container explodes on cargo ship at China's key Ningbo port
item.description: A hazardous goods container exploded Friday on a ship operating in China's Ningbo Port, vessel owner Yang Ming told CNBC in a statement.

item.title: ‚ÄòHe doesn‚Äôt want to help‚Äô: My mother took out a student loan during her marriage. Is my stepfather on the hook?
item.description: ‚ÄúMy stepfather has declared bankruptcy.‚Äù

item.title: Delta says chaos after CrowdStrike outage cost it $380 million in revenue
item.description: Delta Air Lines on Thursday said last month's CrowdStrike outage and subsequent mass flight cancellations cost it some $550 million

item.title: UK investment platform Hargreaves Lansdown agrees to $6.9 billion takeover by CVC consortium
item.description: Hargreaves Lansdown, the U.K.'s biggest stockbroker, said it had agreed to $6.94 billion by a consortium including CVC Capital Partners.
